name: MyFamily
0:
”Alexa, open My Family and tell Charlie to turn the lights off”
”tell Peter to stop farting”
”tell Arizona I love her”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my family
des:
The My Family Alexa Skill provides some light-hearted fun for those mildly irritating moments at home when you need a voice of authority with a witty retort, or the soothing tones of Alexa to highlight an endearment.

Responses are always witty and light-hearted. Where possible swear words spoken by the user are filtered out and met with a response excluding any such words.

This skill does NOT store any information supplied by the user beyond it’s use in the immediate response.

The skill’s main function recognises a name and a subject to generate a response.

For example if you say:

“Alexa, open My Family and tell Charlie to turn the lights off”

Alexa picks out “Charlie” and “lights” and will respond with:

“Hey, Charlie! The international space station just called, and asked if you could turn the lights off. You’re burning a hole in the atmosphere and they’re trying to get some sleep”

A selection of other things you can say:
tell Jane I love her
tell Peter to stop farting
ask James where he left the TV remote
tell James to turn the Xbox off now
tell Jane to have a shower
tell Peter to stop picking his nose
tell James to do his homework now
tell Jane it’s bedtime now.

For more information and to make suggestions or to provide feedback please visit: 

http://boldstart.co.uk/my-family-alexa-skill/
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
